text: I now give the floor to his Excellency
Dennis Reynolds
Colleen dress
Minister of Foreign Affairs of Nicaragua
Your Excellence the floor is yours
senores
ladies and gentlemen
Daniel
Ortega president of Nicaragua
wishes to send to you and to the world
the following message
Mr President
brother and sister delegates
the people of Nicaragua salute the
people represent the peoples represented
in this 78th general assembly of the
United Nations
with their heads held high as always
because we have managed
to live overcoming all the tragedies and
catastrophes inflicted by the history of
domination cruelty intervention
occupation and interference in all
aspects of our life including our
electoral processes intervened in by the
empires and their economic and Military
might
which they've used to try and destroy us
and dominate us
we are living through the extinction of
the imperialist colonialist model of
looting and genocide whose greed has
impacted nature and our world
a world of many heritages languages and
steadfast ways of life
in these times of decision
and substantive change and in order to
recover all of our rights and values
in the face of overwhelming criminal
greed of colonialism and imperialism in
all their manifestations
Nicaragua
continues
to engage in all the battles of General
Freedom for light and the truth that
cannot be concealed
we are the immense and Invincible force
of our courageous new world
of people's
who do not allow themselves to be
separated from Hope or faith
and from our growing spiritual strength
we demand respectful cooperation
solidarity and human fraternity
so that everything may change be
transformed and we may live peacefully
and securely working and prospering and
our own sacred land
in shared Destiny and prosperity
this world which has now stood up and
has started to make its way claiming its
own voice and identity its ancestral and
current knowledge this world of a
culture of peace
has spoken at the 78th United Nations
General Assembly
to continue with ever greater
self-assurance and certainty sowing
cultivating and harvesting the
indispensable transformations
even at this United Nations whose Nature
has been distorted
sadly turning it into a body that is
servile and dependent on
the powers that be
the new world which belongs to us all
demands respect
it demands peace
it insists on peace Justice for everyone
it demands
met remembrance history reparation and
non-repetition
that is why from this Rostrum of the
78th General Assembly we demand that the
United Nations enforce the Mandate of
the international court of justice in
The Hague which in 1986
sentenced the United States of America
to
compensate Nicaragua at least in part
for the costs of the destruction
permanent aggression pain and suffering
of hundreds of thousands of families
during the insane and vengeful War
imposed on our country and our people
in what was then called the
counter-revolution
of course this will not restore lives it
does not alleviate the broken hearts of
so many families and individuals but at
least
it allows for rebuilding for all
nicaraguans the economic social
productive
cultural infrastructure
which those responsible shattered with
their grotesque intervention but which
as always every time was defeated by the
owner integrity and Glory of Nicaragua's
Spirit by the grace of God
sandino
lives lives in each of these victories
against nefarious and diabolical
imperialism and sandin and sandino is in
this room today demanding that all of us
comply and force the law and
international law to indemnify the
Nicaraguan people with what they deserve
in all Justice and Truth
after having asserted
so much the right to peace and life
insisting on what belongs to us
sovereignty freedom
Harmony to make our way in our own
destinies
we demand that the United Nations
pronounce in its own rights and order
the government of the United States of
America to comply with the historic
judgment that condemned them and obliged
them to recognize Nicaragua and that the
United States be forced to abide by it
in all its commendable points
Nicaragua with the dignity and heroism
of our struggles races people's cultures
of Living Well demands this closure and
also joined the demand of all the
peoples and countries that have spoken
from this place
to denounce the aggressive
interventionist arbitrary unjust
policies
whose course of unilateral measures
are not only illegal and illegitimate
but constitute a destabilizing
destructive war-like methods imposing
changes of governments through Cruise
data
attempts to bring about coups and acts
of vandalism known these days as color
revolutions
causing grief to so many families among
so many peoples
we stand in permanent solidarity with
the peoples and countries that live
through these uncivilized barbarisms
which indeed repeat the waves and Echoes
of the imperious colonialist fascist
models
which have caused the death
of millions of human beings imposing
regimes of Terror and deprivation
with shameful tides and unprecedented
tsunamis of migration
these tragedies
trace the desperation of Injustice and
the neo-colonial pretense
to silence Dominate and exclude so as to
continue plundering the wealth
of the world's peoples
entire countries have been lead waste in
these brutal scorched Earth policies
which seek to satisfy the beastly
appetites of the Earth's imperialists
entire countries have been occupied and
their people's sacrificed and massacred
via the same atrocious policies and
actions violating All Rights
which reinforce what we know and
denounce here again as hate crimes
our permanent and combative solidarity
with the Palestinian people the Syrian
people the Sahara we people the era
train people the people in all those
places
that have wanted
to create fascist and and Neo-Nazi
enclaves
our permanent and combative solidarity
to all the peoples and struggle in
Africa Asia and Latin America
we are peoples and countries that resist
and invite the blockades the economic
Warfare the systemic and permanent
intervention in the social cultural
economic and political life of all of
our institutions
as you note more and more violations of
All Rights on top of one another
our combative solidarity with the people
of Cuba
with Marty Fidel Raul Miguel Dias canel
over 62 years of murderous blockade
our combative solidarity with the
bolivarian Republic of Venezuela where
Chavez lives on
the struggle goes on and where Nicolas
has defeated all attempts at destruction
our combative solidarity with the
peoples and governments of our Central
American region
that do not bend the knee in the
struggle for security
for peace so as to confront and conquer
the hell of poverty our solidarity with
Honduras and its Brave president xiomara
Castro Honduras are fraternal neighbor
where morathan and sandino prevailed our
family fraternal Embrace always in
solidarity
our combative solidarity with Bolivia
the great people of Tupac katari
who are moving ahead amidst the same
threats as always with the people of
Argentina and their Sovereign rights
over the malvinus islands with Puerto
Rico Brave and Unstoppable in their just
struggle for Independence
our strength is with the People's
Republic of China
the power that today shows the world and
the Human family how solidarity
respectful cooperation generous brother
and Sisterhood can be practiced and
lived between older brothers and sisters
younger brothers and sisters but all as
one big family with a common destiny
such that we may fight
to overcome the actions of dispossession
and economics stagnation and poverty
imposed as it is on so many peoples
our active and combative solidarity with
the Democratic People's Republic of
Korea in its historical battles for
sovereignty and rights
to the people of Belarus
always dignified and in solidarity our
respect and recognition
our solidarity and combative strength
with the historic struggles waged by the
Russian Federation for peace and
security for a world that we must all
defend from the growing threats of
Empire and their Neo-Nazi policies their
fascist emblems and contents which
intend to return us to the
perversion of expansionism and Wars of
domination which left millions of dads
and families destroyed around the globe
our support to the Russian Federation is
an unwavering support and an inescapable
inescapable Human Alliance for security
dialogue and Harmony essential
Irreplaceable for the human community
our solidarity and accompaniment with
the Islamic Republic of Iran another
example of sharing and coexisting with
peoples ravaged by Imperial greed
despite the incessant
excessive and infernal arrogance of
those who think they are superior
we reaffirm it here today they do not
separate us and together we travel along
paths of courage and dignity
Mr President ladies and gentlemen
delegates
from this forum we demand respect for
the United Nations system in order
to return to its founding values
in this other world where we learn keep
ourselves abreast and continue
defending just Sovereign self-defined
models
based on the maximum respect for the
rights of others is peace external
Commander human Chavez Frias had already
expressed this before the United Nations
General Assembly in 2005. he said the
United Nations must be refounded and
this was taken up by Nicaragua's foreign
minister of dignity
Miguel descoto also president of the
United Nations General Assembly when in
he raised the urgency of refunding the
United Nations to serve the world's
peoples
the United Nations has just held a
meeting of heads of state and
governments of the g77 plus China in
Cuba which reached agreements of
fundamental importance for the world
agreements that must be taken on board
and fulfilled so that with a
consciousness of freedom and of the
brother and Sisterhood of the Human
family
we can continue to break the chains of
slavery and dependence of submission and
subordination of servile obedience
which the selfish ambitious and
perfidious Colonial Imperial interest
intends even at this stage in history to
continue imposing on us
we look with hope and see the recent
meetings and enlargement of the bricks
which today with Brazil Russia India
China South Africa and joined by
Argentina Saudi Arabia
the United Arab Emirates Egypt Ethiopia
and Iran
represent new forces and strength in the
struggles for our economic and financial
sovereignty as free
and capable peoples
in the face of all the advances in
science
Technologies techniques including those
pretentiously called artificial
intelligence
as if not themselves the fruit of human
intelligence
Nicaragua demands the full participation
of the peoples who have made possible
with our blood and resources these
advances of the conquerors
we demand what is ours the right to
fully live this development improving
the conditions of Labor study and Life
by right of our peoples
at the same time as we propose inclusion
Nicaragua also proposes the rational
beneficial use of these resources
of humanity which in the hands of the
malevolent
constitute weapons of mass destruction
against countries peoples and
communities
always together
always advancing as sandino said with
proposals based on respect
consideration brother and Sisterhood and
a nation for all based on our country's
sovereignty Nicaragua
joins the intense search for and
struggle to defend our inheritance of
Natural Resources our cultures our
languages
our ways of life our original
communities working
everyday and tirelessly for peace which
is not only a right
but an urgent necessity for the survival
of humanity
that is to say for Life as we all
deserve it
the aggressions which they arrogantly
and hotly call sanctions do not Define
us nor do they intimidate intimidate us
nor do they disable or bend us nor do
they lead us to sell out or Surrender
we indeed do not know the word surrender
allow me to reaffirm it
the aggressions which they arrogantly
mostly call sanctions shall not Define
us or intimidate us disable or bend us
or lead us to sellout or to surrender we
do not know the word surrender
life is made up of daily struggles to
assert what belongs to us a world free
of War of chemical and nuclear weapons
of looting ignorance fraud
of new
deceptions and reason theft including
the assault on our talent
a world free of offenses because War
looting and poverty caused by them
Misery pandemics the lack of health
education housing the lack of favorable
living conditions
all constitute
offenses that are degrading humiliating
cruel degrading and
an immense prison
where human security is denied
promoting Seas of Exodus
bereft of dignity cutting off hope Joy
culture and life for the majority of the
planet
a world free of brutality free of
aggression
of arrogance a world free of supreme
ignorance
a world free of hatred evil misery a
world free of sadness of emotional
toxicity
a world free of deformation apathy
depression intentionally created
by drugs which have become another form
of terrorism
among so many other perversions and
provocations that besiege us a world
free of impositions a world of vigor
courage values a world committed to a
simple powerful forceful common good
that love is stronger than hatred and
that it can conquer all love
which we all should dearly need to build
trust so as definitely to install New
Horizons and prodigious futures
we want a world of Spiritual Beings
who are also human beings
imperfect but you can and must close
ranks to recover the goodness and
strength of
this planet that we share
above and beyond all the forms of
terrorism
inflicted on us
there is the spirit the Eternal Flame
the Insignia and Axiom of our Human
Condition
for that we fight
that is why we will win
and because of this
we will overcome
written in Managua 26 September 2003
Daniela Ortega said severe Rosario thank
you very much
[Applause]
thank the minister for foreign affairs
of
